FingerKey: use Touch ID to unlock your Mac

FingerKey: use Touch ID to unlock your Mac — Neat, but I don’t see this being very useful. Reminds me a bit of Knock, which did some similar iPhone-unlocks-your-Mac trickery. These are fun apps to show off to friends but ultimately a bit pointless.

Published November 30 2014

Enjoy your day.
